graph_title: Number of people who died or disappeared in the process of migration towards an international destination
indicator_name: Number of people who died or disappeared in the process of migration towards an international destination
SDG_GOAL: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG_TARGET: Target 10.7: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator: 10.7.3: Number of people who died or disappeared in the process of migration towards an international destination
STAT_CONC_DEF: The indicator is defined as the total count of population who have been recognized as refugees as a proportion of the total population of their country of origin, expressed per 100,000 population.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 10.7: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator: 10.7.3: Number of people who died or disappeared in the process of migration towards an international destination

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 10.7 : Faciliter la migration et la mobilité de façon ordonnée, sûre, régulière et responsable, notamment par la mise en œuvre de politiques migratoires planifiées et bien gérées.
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 10.7.3 : Nombre de personnes décédées ou disparues lors de la migration vers une destination internationale.
